details.text: Global interconnect for 8 global loads and 4 global stores. Reduce number of global loads and stores to simplify global interconnect.
For 8 global loads and 4 global stores.

links.guide: Best Practices Guide : Global Memory Interconnect

details.text: This read-only memory contains information for the host about the system and about each kernel in the system, including kernel names, arguments, and attributes. The system description ROM ensures that the binary image on the FPGA is compatible with the host program.

Additional information.text: Requested size 1048576 bytes, implemented size 4194304 bytes, replicated 4 times total, stallable, 2 reads and 2 writes.

details.text: Reduce the number of write accesses or fix banking to make this memory system stall-free. Banking may be improved by using compile-time known indexing on lowest array dimension.

Additional information.text: 4 independent copies of this memory were created to enable simultaneous execution of 4 loop iterations defined at  (%L)
You can reduce the number of copies of this memory by limiting the concurrency of its loop; see the OpenCL Programming Guide for details.
Banked on bit 6 into 2 separate banks.
Private memory implemented in on-chip block RAM.

details.text: Resources for live values and control logic. To reduce this area:
reduce scope of local variables, localizing them as much as possible
Resources for loop-carried dependencies. To reduce this area:
reduce number and size of loop-carried variables
Logic required to efficiently support sets of operations that do not stall
Logic required to efficiently support sets of operations that do not stall. This area cannot be affected directly.

Load uses a Burst-coalesced cached LSU.  Load with a private 512 kilobit cache. Cache is not shared with any other load. It is flushed on kernel start. Use Dynamic Profiler to verify cache effectiveness. Other kernels should not be updating the data in global memory while this kernel is using it. Cache is created when memory access pattern is data-dependent or appears to be repetitive. Simplify access pattern or mark pointer as 'volatile' to disable generation of this cache.

Burst-coalesced cached LSU,
Load with a private 512 kilobit cache
Stallable write to memory declared on %L.
